node.Description: Was honoured as one of the participants with the most contribution in the COVID-19 prevention operation by Vietnam Ministry of Health.
Awarded for honourable contributions to the society as a University student.
Awarded for making into the 4th place of the Tetris Blitz Tournament, a speed-played Tetris game under a limited amount of time.
Tutored TCFS students Maths 1 and 2 (Equivalent VCE Math Methods 1/2 & 3/4).

Collected excessive table tennis rubber pieces and hand-crafted them into rubber products that can bring high quality at a cheaper price. This recycle idea has received positive reviews as a solution of material reusage.

node.School: Trinity College - The University of Melbourne
HSG - Vietnam National University (Phổ Thông Năng Khiếu)

node.Description: Trained as a developer in the DevOps team and infrastructure department, and operated the automation of server production. Have also compiled a guide to introductory server learning for later interns.
Initiated and lead in constructing a photo society for high school students to share and gain experience together, via hosting a series of instruction workshops, work events and photowalks.
In charge of the content team, as well as the member network in Southern Vietnam, and provided media contents for the website via blog posts and trip albums.

node.Company: SUGAR - Tokyo University Culture Exchange Program
node.Description: Coordinated and supervised a group of high school students to organise the summer break culture exchange program for Tokyo University students, which invovles city tours, traditional game hosting, and orphanage charity visits.
Hosted a series of busking events and charity sales to raise fund for Francis Shelter in Dong Nai, Vietnam. The total fund raised was up to $4000.
Photographer: VietAbroader, Just Media; Mentor: PTNK Harmonica Club, PTNK Guitar Club.
